description:
The incumbent focuses on providing operational and project support ensuring that the network is highly available. Assists in the planning and evaluation of existing network platforms and systems. Is involved in the development of technical standards, interface applications, evaluation of new products and network problem resolutions. Serves as a liaison between technical teams and internal clients to establish new network connectivity request and assists with ongoing maintenance.

Technical Skills • Network Engineer - Cisco, LAN, WAN, WLAN. • Deep knowledge of Networking / Dynamic Routing Protocols. • Upgrade software on hardware such as Switches, Routers and Wireless. • Technical and non-technical Documentation | Visio.

3+ year of experience in ISP or global company and multiple cultures. • Excellent time management and attention to detail is essential. • Knowledge of agile methodology. • Good written and verbal communication skills.


Very good English level. •CCNA/CCNP, CCIE advantage. Education & Experience •Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience: degree in computer science, mathematics, engineering, or other technical degree preferred. • Master’s degree preferred

Your Impact & Responsibilities

Why should you Join Check Point Technical Support family?

Get experience with the security products of the leading vendor in the Cyber Security industry.
Challenge yourself on daily basis with complex, technical issues.
Work with the biggest Enterprise IT departments around the world.
Join a team of motivated, fun and creative minds.
Build a long-term career at Check Point with multiple options for future growth.

The training materials will include:

Networking
Operating Systems
Check Point’s leading products
Professional tools and methodologies
The training will begin on 05.03.2023
Your Knowledge & Skills
Technical orientation, no experience is required! We will teach you everything you need.
Very good English skills (Spoken and written).

Conduct ad-hoc research projects, involving planning, executing, and analyzing the results. Execution involves designing tests and working hands-on in the lab.
The job necessitates high analytical skills, as well as good technical skills.
Ability to systematically work on different projects at the same time.
Provide design inputs to existing or new products, based on the results of the Research work
Write technical reports based on multiple testing.
Collaborate with different functions within the organization, both technical and cross functional.
Create working plans and manage resources to support Research activities.

Required Education/Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in Biomedical\mechanical engineering
High self-learning ability
Strong execution, communication, and interpersonal relationship
Technical oriented skills
Basic understanding of statistical techniques
Fluent English both oral and written

Required Experience:
1-4 years of experience in medical device
Preferred experience with cardiovascular industry
Knowledge and understanding of imaging modalities as CT, Fluoroscopy and echocardiography – Advantage
Programing experience in Python and MATLAB - advantage

About Edwards Lifesciences

Edwards Lifesciences is the global leader in patient-focused medical innovations for structural heart disease, as well as critical care and surgical monitoring. Driven by a passion to help patients, the company collaborates with the world’s leading clinicians and researchers to address unmet healthcare needs, working to improve patient outcomes and enhance lives. Headquartered in Irvine, California, Edwards Lifesciences has extensive operations in North America, Europe, Japan, Latin America and Asia and currently employs over 13,000 individuals worldwide.

For us, helping patients is not a slogan - it’s our life’s work. From developing devices that replace or repair a diseased heart valve to creating new technologies that monitor vital signs in the critical care setting, we focus on helping patients regain and improve the quality of their life.

COVID Vaccination Requirement

Edwards is committed to complying with the requirements and guidance from our government authorities and to protecting our vulnerable patients and the healthcare providers who are treating them around the world. As such, all Healthcare Interacting positions require COVID-19 vaccination, which includes anyone who directly interfaces with patients and those who interact with healthcare providers as part of their role. If hired, as a condition of employment, you will be required to submit proof that you have been fully vaccinated for COVID-19, unless you request and are granted a medical or religious accommodation for exemption from the vaccination requirement. This vaccination requirement does not apply in countries where it is prohibited by law to impose vaccination. In countries where vaccines are less available, or other requirements exist, we may institute alternate measures that optimize patient safety and healthcare provider safety, which may include regular COVID testing or specific masking requirements.

For United States Applicants Only:
Edwards is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer including protected Veterans and individuals with disabilities.

description:

Job Description:
An opportunity to join Broadcom Inc., Dune R&D Center (StrataDNX product-line), and take part in the development of future networking products!!
We are looking for exceptional, innovative software engineers to develop our next-generation cutting-edge networking platforms which are located at the core of Global Internet, Core Routers, Carrier Networks, Service Providers, Data Centers, White Box systems, Enterprise systems, and Telecom infrastructure.
You will join the software development group and take a leading part in the full life-cycle software development: from design and coding of Networking Software APIs, Data-path Programming, Management of different Software and Hardware Components, testing during the early stages of the feature to optimizations, debug, providing tools and integration into customer products.
We are looking for passionate engineers that will take our Software to the next level!
Requirements:
B.Sc. in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a related field from a recognized university, cum laude
At least 3 years of experience in C/C++ SW Development or exceptional graduate
Passionate, Responsible and Team-player
Must be a quick learner with the ability to adopt new technologies and methodologies
Advantages:
Experience in Software-Embedded/Real-Time Software development
Experience with working on Linux environment
Have background knowledge in Networking protocols (e.g. Ethernet, IP, how switching/routing works)
Broadcom is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We will consider qualified applicants without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, citizenship, disability status, medical condition, pregnancy, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. job: FAST Rotation Program - Technical Sales Engineer - Tel Aviv, Israel
description:
About TI
As a global semiconductor company operating in 35 countries, Texas Instruments (TI) is first and foremost a reflection of its people. From the TIer who unveiled the first working integrated circuit in 1958 to the more than 30,000 TIers around the world today who design, manufacture and sell analog and embedded processing chips, we are problem-solvers collaborating to change the world through technology. Put your talent to work with us – change the world, love your job!
About the job
TI’s FAST (Field Applications & Sales Training) Rotation Program is designed to prepare Sales & Applications team members for customer-oriented careers that pair technical skills with business perspectives. The program provides experiences that help rising TIers understand how to successfully grow TI’s business and to thrive throughout their entire TI career. There are two available FAST program tracks: (1) Field Applications and (2) Technical Sales.
Job description:
This 7-month experience aims to teach Technical Sales Associates (TSAs) how to build and manage customer relationships, and how to influence decisions to grow TI’s revenue. The track includes three rotations:
Rotation 1, Field Sales Office (FSO): This 3-month rotation integrates TSAs with a local TI sales team, offering first-hand experience of TI’s sales process. TSAs partner with customers and internal teams to uncover and win every possible customer opportunity, and also leverage our one-of-a-kind virtual account system to learn how to find, define, and win opportunities in a mix of real-time and simulated environments.
Rotation 2, Sales Operations: This 2-month rotation provides first-hand experience working with the pricing and customer service teams. Focus areas for this rotation include pricing models, supply chain functions, price negotiation, and an overview of pricing guidelines, laws, procedures and tools.
Rotation 3, Product Marketing: This 2-month rotation focuses on the relationship between sales and a particular product line. This rotation helps TSAs understand product life cycles, roadmap development, marketing approaches, and ways to collaborate with product marketing to win at the customer.
Upon successful completion of this track in the FAST program, rotators are welcomed as Technical Sales Representatives (TSRs) on TI’s Worldwide Sales & Applications team.
Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
Using technical expertise, various sales tools and relationships with engineering teams to identify projects
Managing and quantifying leads, and managing the commercial aspects of customer relationships
Developing, forecasting and monitoring an annual plan for revenue growth
Minimum Qualifications:
Bachelors in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering or related field
Fluent in English and Hebrew
Preferred Qualifications:
Ability to effectively balance strong technical skills with solid relationship-building capabilities
Demonstrated strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong written, verbal communication skills
Ability to work in teams and collaborate effectively with people across various functions
Strong time management skills that enable on-time project delivery
Demonstrated ability to build strong, influential relationships
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment
Ability to take the initiative and drive for results
Our Offer:
Benefit from a competitive salary
Yearly profit sharing (dependent on company success)
Many additional benefits
Join an international work environment where your ideas count and where you can thrive in a diverse culture. Explore a world of opportunities for your personal and professional development
Texas Instruments is an equal opportunity employer and supports a diverse, inclusive work environment.

If you are interested in this position, please apply to this requisition.Show more Report

We are NeoGames, a global leader of iLottery solutions and services to the national and state-regulated lotteries.
We empower our customers to create the most successful iLottery programs with a complete solution that includes industry-leading omnichannel platforms, an innovative portfolio of the best-performing interactive games, and a full suite of business and technology services.
We are on the lookout for extraordinary people, who will be eager to learn, to be a part of a team and share our vision.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English – MustProven ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a creative, customer-oriented and results-driven mindset – MustStrong understanding of web and web-related technologies and Client/Server applications – An advantagePrevious experience in SQL – An advantage2+ years of relevant experience in a customer-focused position involving technical knowledge – An advantageExperience with Web debugging tools – An advantageService Oriented and good communication and interpersonal skillsFast & self-learner, hardworking, team player, organized and responsible, dynamic, motivated and independentBachelor's degree in Computer Science / Software Engineering (or similar) – An advantage24/7 availability in case of critical issues (on-call duty)

Communicate with a customer in e-mails, JIRA items, and conference callsProvide Tier 3/4 services for internal and external entities, provide high level of support to meet the customer SLA, and minimize escalations to R&D
Interface with various Departments, R&D and Customer Support groups to address product issues in complex environmentsOwn, troubleshoot and solve customer technical issues, using collaboration, troubleshooting best practices and transparency within and across teamsPrioritize, monitor, and be responsible for the progress of all problems reportedManage critical escalations during on and off hoursShow more Report

description: SW Quality Engineer לחברת מדיקל גלובלית בצפון. התפקיד כולל: בדיקות ידניות למוצרים רפואיים חדשניים, כתיבת מסמכי בדיקות, השתלבות ועבודה בצוות, ועוד. הזדמנות להשתלב בחברה מובילה בתחומה בתפקיד משמעותי ותנאים מצויינים. - השכלה רלוונטית - 3 שנות ניסיון בבדיקות QA למערכת חומרה-תוכנה - ניסיון עבודה מחברת מדיקל - ניסיון בתכיבת מסמכי בדיקותShow more Report

DESCRIPTION
At Infinidat, we help enterprises and service providers empower their data-driven competitive advantage at scale. We are a leading provider of enterprise-class storage solutions. The company’s software-focused architecture delivers sub-millisecond latency, full availability, and scalability with a significantly lower total cost of ownership than competing storage technologies.
An Infinidat Technical Advisor (TA) is an experienced Storage Systems Engineer providing our customers with a named technical resource for the duration of the lifecycle of their installed system(s). As the customer’s trusted advisor, the TA provides a full spectrum of services. During the time of the engagement, the TA will learn about the customer’s IT operations as it relates to the ongoing implementation of the Infinidat storage systems.
RESPONSIBILITIES
Act as a single technical point of contact post-sales for non-break/fix issues
Support and guide the customer through the implementation of new systems into their environment
Establish a comprehensive understanding of the customer's environment (e.g. applications, servers, network, virtualization) integrated with the Infinidat systems
Advocate on behalf of the customer, ensuring all specific needs and concerns are properly communicated with Infinidat
Act as a Crisis Manager in the event of serious service impact
Provide regular executive updates to the customer and to Infinidat senior management
Work with support and account teams to produce and deliver Root Cause Analysis
Follow up on open customer issues and requests to ensure timely resolution
Conduct periodic Service Reviews with the customer and their account team
Pro-actively work with the customer to recommend code levels, best practices and relevant white paper
REQUIREMENTS
Project Management experience
Sensitivity and tolerance when dealing with customers
Interpersonal skills and positive communication skills
Ability to team effectively and work with other departments within Infinidat particularly the support teams
Ability to work independently and use own initiative
A capability to operate in an ever-changing dynamic working environment
Creative thinking when looking for technological solutions
Good understanding of Unix operating systems, particularly CentOS
Deep understanding of central NAS and SAN storage systems
Understanding of Ethernet, iSCSI and FC SAN networks
Good understanding of open system world compute
Good understanding of VMware and Hyper V virtual environments
Good understanding of DRP and backup environments
An understanding of API and scripting with Python.
Familiarity with DB and application environments, including Oracle, SAP, Microsoft SQL, Exchange
Fluent English language skills (both oral and written)
5+ years of Storage Industry Experience
About Infinidat
Award-winning Infinidat is a global provider of enterprise storage platforms and solutions. Installed in Global Fortune 500 companies around the world supporting a wide variety of applications and use cases, our software defined storage architecture delivers microsecond latency, autonomous automation, powerful cyber storage resilience, 100% guaranteed availability, and dramatically reduces enterprise storage CAPEX and OPEX.
The company’s portfolio has been named a Leader for four consecutive years in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for primary storage, has received the Gartner Peer Insights Customers’ Choice Award for 3 consecutive years based on end-users’ ratings, as well as numerous other awards from the storage analyst and storage press community.
Our success continues to be based on the talent, experience, and motivation of employees who leverage their skills and abilities to make a real impact in the industry.
If you have the power to be the best of the best, we would love to have you join the Infinidat family and make a mark as an essential player in our company’s growth.Show more Report

We are looking for a Full-Stack Engineer to join our team and deliver innovative solutions in the heart of the finance industry by using the latest technology stack, modern architecture, and software engineering best practices.

You will have a significant impact on creating new solutions, and you will own features from design to production, using cutting edge technologies, resources and backing of a global leader in the financial industry. You will be involved in full product life cycles, working with excellent software engineering, product owners, user experience experts, as well as our business stakeholders.


You should be proficient with front-end and back-end coding, web-services, database systems (both NoSQL and Relational), software security, performance, and scale. As a developer, we look first and foremost for people who are passionate about solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. You will be required to apply your in-depth knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the software development lifecycle and stay focused on the team's goals and the business strategy.
Your Role and Responsibilities

Research and development solutions to challenged problems
Take end to end ownership - develop, test, and deploy full-stack web applications
Autodidactic abilities to ramp-up quickly on new technologies
Write clean code using superb quality and security standards of products
Improve everything you touch with a passion for experimentation process
Product oriented combining thoughtfulness and pragmatism to get stuff done
Collaborate with teams in multiple regions and time zones
Your Qualifications

B.Sc. in Computer Science (or an equivalent)
5+ years of experience with software development and web applications
2+ years of proven experience in client side development using React, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
Hands-on experience in one of the back-end programming languages Java/Python
Familiarity with state management frameworks such as Redux
Knowledge of front-end testing frameworks such as Jest/Enzyme
Excellent verbal and written communication skills (Both Hebrew and English)
Advantages

Experience with Agile scrum methodology and CI/CD deployment process
Knowledge of RDBMS, NoSQL databases, and SQL queries
Familiarity with Spring framework and Spring Boot web applications
Knowledge of Cloud technologies (preferably AWS)

Description

Deloitte Analytics, a part of Deloitte Israel consulting practice, is looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our growing team!

How your day will look like:

As a Data Engineer, you will take an integral part in our local and global projects.
Our clients come from a wide range of industries and organizations across the globe.
You will work in collaboration with the data architect and data scientists and will be responsible for the development and implementation of data gathering, maintenance, deployment of DS pipelines, and helping to build infrastructural solutions that support the data, science teams.
You will collaborate with internal teams to facilitate solutions for DMPs.
Requirements
MSc/BA in Computer Science or another relevant field.
A passionate Data Engineer with experience in developing data pipelines using AWS/Azure/other cloud-based technologies and Big Data technology stack to create custom solutions using large data sets.
Experienced in writing APIs, scrapers, and crawlers.
2-6 years of experience with Data Modeling and tuning of relational as well as NoSQL datastores (Athena, MongoDB, MySQL, Red-shift, etc.)
2-6 years experience in ETL development using Big Data Technologies (Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Pig, Spark, etc.) – is a plus.
Experience using cloud-native tools and design patterns (Containers, Serverless, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.) – is a plus.
Fluent in English
Team player with a can-do attitude

Full time Job

Location: Tel Aviv, Hybrid
We at Deloitte believe that diversity and inclusion among our people is a critical component of our success and that is why we cultivate an organizational culture that contains and embraces diversity in all its forms.Show more Report
